Half Life 2 yani ne diyebilirim ki.
Been playing this game for over 10 years. First on the original Xbox, now on PC. If that doesn't tell you anything about replay value, then I don't know what does.

You already know it.

+ Amazing story
+ Interesting characters
+ Intriguing world 
+ Butter smooth movement & Gun play
+ Both Ep 1 & 2 improves all this furthermore
+ Perfect sequel - Improved on every aspect from its predecessor 
+ It revolutionized an entire genre, what more do you want?

- Ep 3 ? (sorry had to)

We've reached the point where playing Source Engine games like this makes me feel old and I don't know how to feel about it.
Best game, best game, ten outta ten.

Aga tamam gelmiş geçmiş en iyi oyunlardan biri buna laf yok ama cidden çok gereksiz şeyler var ya. Her boku yapmışsınız tamam ama şu Gordon'un niye sesi yok ya da şu araç kullanma görevleri neden bu kadar fazla uzun  son olarakta araya az biraz sinematik ekleseydiniz keşke adam metroda başlıyor kulede bitiriyor. Onun yanında silahlar gayet iyi yan karakterler fena değil atmosfer zaten sağlam ve düşmanlarda gayet çeşitli ve dengeli. Şu ana kadar oyunu beğenmedim ama Episode 1 eğlendirecek gibi.
If you like shooting games, science fiction, puzzles and intrigue, this game is one of the best investments you can do, and I'm not only talking about money here, but time. 100% recommended.

Мяу

It's Half-Life. :shrug:

7/10

This game saved my life.

I am 41.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.
After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

Классика, да и только, для своего времени игра просто шедевр, да и сейчас она выглядит довольно свежо

Half-life 2 es la secuela de un shooter que revoluciono el género y con esta segunda entrega, Valve ha vuelto hacer-lo.

Este juego tiene de todo, entre miles de virtudes hay pequeños fallos que no afectan a la experiencia de la partida. La trama es sublime, ya no es por el hecho de que G-man vuelva a tener un papel misterioso sino que también es muy relevante y muy carismático aparte de que estas en medio de una guerra civil pero el juego se centra principalmente en la forma de narrar la historia, sin cinemáticas ni scripts, ahí respecto a su entrega anterior es mas de lo mismo solo que con esta secuela refuerza esta idea.

Gráficamente luce espectacular, hay escenarios muy bien detallados y con unas físicas muy realistas, si es verdad que el modelado de los personajes no son del todo perfectos pero como ya he dicho antes, se mueven de manera realista y no están mal diseñados. Hablando en profundidad de las físicas del juego, gracias al motor físico Havok y gráfico de Source, nos de muchas posibilidades en la jugabilidad y como nos lo demuestra Valve? pues con la pistola de gravedad.

La jugabilidad es otro punto a favor, durante la aventura se incluyen varios elementos de otros géneros como la conducción, plataformas, survival horror (Ravenholm) shooter táctico y puzzles, en cuanto sus puzzles son simplones pero aprovechan el motor de Havok. Los tiroteos son geniales, con un arsenal que si es verdad es menor que el del Half-life 1 y menos variedad de enemigos no decepciona. Nos encontraremos a enemigos tanto extraterrestres como el de la alianza (digamos que los enemigos es mas de lo mismo). El combate contra el jefe final no me ha acabado de convencer, me hubiese gustado un poco mas de desafío aun así es mas que digno.
También ha arreglado el movimiento de Freeman ya que al primer juego de Valve se movía como si tuviese unos patines.

 que decir de los doblajes en español, es poco creíble como los personajes se expresan ante situaciones de tensión, vuelvo a repetir que ha mejorado en esta secuela pero resta credibilidad en la historia. Quitando de lado esto, el sonido de las armas, disparos, explosiones, el coche y demás es un factor mas que decente.

Otro punto que destaca Half-life 2 es la innovación, todo lo anterior dicho es la muestra de lo tanto que ha innovado la saga y no solo en la saga sino en la industria y en el género de los shooter en primera persona.

Conclusión: Es un juego inolvidable que se ha ganado un 10 por ser un juego único, con una inmersión espectacular y con miles de detalles.
Tiene sus fallos si, por ejemplo el mas destacable es el tiempo de carga que aparece donde menos te lo esperas y es un poco mas largo que el anterior Half-life.
Pero de todos esos fallos, no son mas que pequeños y no afectan al juego y en mi partida no he visto casi ningún bug. Es la secuela perfecta y uno de los mejores juegos de la historia que necesitas jugar si te van los Shooter en primera persona.
